channel.title: 317 Client for Macs & Pcs with Jar Launch
channel.description:
My problem is I am hosting a server for many mac users (came from a great 508 mac server) and now many are playing my 317. To make a client universal, I need it to run from a .jar, but I would like the ability to edit the client and not have it all compiled to a single .jar for anti-leech or whatever it's used for. I would also prefer a client that has
-God swords with Specs
-Dragon claws (on rune claws) with Spec
-All skillcapes
-Many to All 474 emotes
Does anybody know of such a client? If there isn't one, could someone tell me how to make a terminal command to have any 317 client work on a Mac (which is 64 bit)?
I do not wish to sound like a begger :| I have been looking for a few months (yes, months since october) for a good client to start with, but have not found any :(
Thank you very much.
[IMG]http://i137.photobucket.com/albums/q232/LaundryLady1947/Runescape/mod_gold.gif[/img]TheCyberMan
P.S. I am on a Mac and have worked with Mac Hosting for quite some time now. I'm disappointed I couldn't solve this problem.
